articles.title: Coronavirus: How does the loss of smell from COVID-19 actually feel like? We ask a COVID-19 survivor - Times of India
articles.description: While earlier fever, dry cough and unexplained exhaustion were considered to be the hallmarks of COVID-19, people are increasingly reporting a loss of smell after contracting the illness.
